TopicTitle: Can't Enter Buildings, R&D Closed and Can't close game

Articles.Content:
In KSP I'm only able to build the first craft, launch it, and then land it, all while doing the Goo science along each stage and getting an EVA Report and Sample. But once I recover the vessel, i'm immediately ejected to the Facility overlook and the pilot is labelled as missing. I can't enter the R&D building because it says that it's closed. I can't enter any buildings other then the Management center where you recruit more Kerbals. Once i'm in the Management building I can't leave it, and I can't exit the game either.

I'm running 1.5.1 and the mods I have are:
 

Spoiler

B9PartSwitch
CactEye

Champagne

CommNetConstellation

CommunityCategoryKit

CommunityResourcePack

CommunityTechTree

ConnectedLivingSpace

CryoEngines

CryotTanks

CTTP

CustomBarnKit

DeployableEngines

DMagicOrbitalScience

DynamicBatteryStorage

HideEmptyTechTreeNodes

KIS

Kopernicus

kOS

ModularFlightIntegrator

All of the Near Future mods

OPM

PlanetaryBaseInc

RemoteTech

REPOSoftTech

SCANsat

ScienceAlert

StationPartsExpansion

StationPartsExpansionRedux

TAC Life Support

Universal Storage

Universal Storage 2

 

It's a load of mods, I know. Sorry if that doesn't make it easier in helping me.

I play on Science mode and the only options I change are Enabling Indestructible Facilities, Enable Kerbal Experience, Hide unresearchable nodes, Remove empty Horizontal and Vertical space, Enable Show Statistics for kOS, and enable Group All Planetary Base System parts in Function Filter.

Edited December 6, 2018 by TheMultiVitamin
I figured it out. Something with RemoteTech was messing up, getting rid of it fixed it.
